title: How do I turn off the audio alert when WiFi/Internet connection drops?
content:
Quite often during the day either the WiFi connection or Internet connection drops. Each time I hear the default beep. I don't know if I just received a new text message or a notification from a calendar entry.
I'd like to turn of the alert for the dropped connection, only, but don't know how.
The device is running Android 10.
